episode.title: Emporium Capwell Company v. Western Addition Community Organization

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 73-696 and the relate case, 73-830, Emporium Capwell Company against Western Addition Community Organization.
For reasons stated in an opinion written by Mr. Justice Marshall, the judgment of the Court of Appeals is reversed.
Mr. Justice Douglas filed a dissenting opinion.
